snp3.6:2.2: pakudho → pakuddho (sya-all, km) | sañcayo → sañjayo (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1) | belaṭṭhaputto → bellaṭṭhiputto (bj); veḷaṭṭhaputto (sya-all); belaṭṭhiputto (pts-vp-pli1) | nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto → nigaṇṭho nātaputto (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
snp3.6:5.2: yepi kho te → ye kho te (sya-all); yaṃ kho te (mr)
snp3.6:6.2: samaṇo kho → samaṇo kho gotamo (sya-all, mr)
snp3.6:51.2: na upalimpati → toye na upalippati (bj); toye na upalippati (pts-vp-pli1); toyena na upalimpati (mr)
